title: The prologue to Mr. Lacy's new play, Sir Hercules Buffoon or the poetical esquire. Written by Tho. Durfey, Gent. Spoken by Mr. Haynes.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Joseph Hindmarsh, bookseller to His Royal Highness, living at the Black Bull in Cornhill,
